item.title: Vapor With Swift4
item.description: Step by step guid to install Vapor2.0 and Postgres with Xcode 9.x and Swift 4: Requirements Vapor Project Heroku Deployment Postgres User and DB Creation Vapor Configuration Requirements Brew Homebrew needs to be installed first to seamlessly install Vapor and Postgres. To install brew in Mac look at Homebrew ##Postgresql Once brew is installed install Postgresql $ brew install postgres Upon successful installation run the below command
